item.title: Abandoned and overgrown allotment plot, 4th September

item.title: Building materials near pavement, 4th September
item.description:

item.title: Foliage covering vms signage, 4th September
item.description:
Re-raised from 7882183 Found drivers view of sign ok but engineers access to cabinet on back of sign still overgrown, also recommend cut back foluage overhanging the sign as it can quickly grow in front of sign and tree debris can get on the sign door seal and cause leaks which damage the LED modules.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sidcup Road, Middle Park, London
